page.title: 10CHILDREN'S PLAY PARK
page.content: CHILDREN'S PLAY PARK. THERE ARE 2 CHILDREN'S PLAY PARKS IN ETTICK DRIVE. EACH HAS 2 SETS OF CHILDREN'S SWINGS, A ROUNDABOUT, A SLIDE, A CLIMBING FRAME WITH A LADDER ATTACHMENT. THE PARK IS GRAVEL WITH PAVED AREAS AROUND EACH ITEM. SCATTERED AROUND THE PARK ARE THREE WOODEN BENCHES WITH BACKS SO THAT PARENTS MAY SIT AND WATCH THEIR CHILDREN. BESIDE THE GRAVEL IS A STRETCH OF GRASS WHERE CHILDREN OFTEN PLAY. I THINK THE GRAVEL AND PAVING SLABS HAVE DANGEROUS FEATURES-IF CHILDREN FALL,AND THERE IS AN ELECTRICITY PYLON ON THE GRASS WITH OVERHEAD CABLES. THE SWINGS AND OTHER EQUIPMENT ARE QUITE OFTEN MENDED BUT THERE IS GRAFFITTI EVERYWHERE.
